title: Braised beef cheeks with pear and bitter chocolate sauce
description: Savoury bitter chocolate sauce and butter-fried pear transform this slow cooked beef dish into a gourmet experience.
ingredients: 200ml/7fl oz double cream, heated to a boil
2 beef cheeks, trimmed and cut into 4 equal-sized pieces
60g/2¼oz chocolate, 70% cocoa solids, broken into squares
